ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Be very afraid....
ygData.msgSnippet: Not sure if they could do the stackable haste spells the way they currently work.  They might be working on it dont know.  But currently 1 haste spell/icon and
ygData.messageBody:
Not sure if they could do the stackable haste spells the way they currently
work. They might be working on it dont know. But currently 1 haste
spell/icon and one item is all that will stack (sure you knew that, just
rambling).

Mu

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:garramone@...]
Sent: Friday, August 24, 2001 6:02 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Be very afraid....


We used to have targetted rune songs, they removed the rune from them
and made them self-only haste songs, not because they were powerful but
because no one used them except for twinking. OoS does debuff CR and
FR, but I know some bards want chants that are for DR and PR which we
don't have. I think better slows and haste would be nice, stackable is
always nice since that is the essence of bard songs.

Shada/Erisi

-----Original Message-----
From: John Grady [mailto:john_grady@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 23, 2001 6:17 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Be very afraid....

Stacking OOS might be a little extreme :), but there's got to be some
good
ideas we can come up with.

* A stackable slow song like Erjav?
* A targeted, stackable Rune song ala SOS?
* More debuff songs ala OOS but for CR, FR, etc.
* A song that refreshes your groups disciplines faster

That's it off the top of my head,
Tzeetch
